scripts.CompileAndCopy: npx tsc --target es3 --lib es5,scripthost --allowJS --newline LF --out bin\DOpus_MovieTagger.js src\index.ts & copy bin\DOpus_MovieTagger.js "%HOMEDRIVE%%HOMEPATH%\AppData\Roaming\GPSoftware\Directory Opus\Script AddIns"
scripts.CompileAndCopyNoComments: npx tsc --target es3 --lib es5,scripthost --allowJS --newline LF --removeComments --out bin\DOpus_MovieTagger.js src\index.ts & copy bin\DOpus_MovieTagger.js "%HOMEDRIVE%%HOMEPATH%\AppData\Roaming\GPSoftware\Directory Opus\Script AddIns"
